O

onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Takes User to add Appointment Page
onActionAddSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.appointmentController
Takes input from textfield/combobox/datepicker and adds appointment to database Before saving, all input is converted to usable form.
onActionAddSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.modifyAppointmentController
Takes User input and Saves appointment Takes time and date and converts to parameters that will be accepted by MYSQL database Checks to make sure all entries have input, otherwise User error message will be generated Checks to see if any entries overlap with previous appointments, will generate user error
onActionAppointmentDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Takes user selected appointment and deletes it from MYsql Database and tableview.
onActionAppointmentModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Takes selected appointment and transfers data to Modify Appointment Controller page If no selection is made, no action happens
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.customerController
Returns page to Main.Main Menu
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.modifyCustomerController
Exits page and returns to Main.Main Menu
onActionCustomerAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Takes User to Add Customer Page
onActionCustomerDelete(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Takes User selected Customer and deletes it from MySQL database and TableView If selected customer still has open appointment, an error is generated to user to delete associated appointment If no selection is made, error message is generated Generates confirmation
onActionCustomerModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Takes user selected customer and transfers data to Customer Modification Page If no selection is made, no event occurs
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.appointmentController
Exits page and returns to Main.Main Menu
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.login
Exit the program
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.modifyAppointmentController
Exits the page and returns to Main.Main Menu
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.reportsController
Exit Button returns to Main.Main Menu
onActionLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.login
Method that takes username and password and passes as parameter to check if Mysql login credentials match If successful, username and success is logged into .txt file If not successful, username and fail is logged into .txt file
onActionLogout(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Logs user out and returns User to Login Page
onActionRadio(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.reportsController
Lambda Expression used here.
onActionReport(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.MainMenu
Takes User to Report Page
onActionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.customerController
Takes input and saves Customer.
onActionSave(ActionEvent) - Method in class Controller.modifyCustomerController
Takes input from modification and saves it.
openConnection() - Static method in class DAO.JDBC
Opens MySQL database
overlappingAppointment(String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Static method in class DAO.AppointmentDB
Checks MySQL Database to see if any overlapping appointments are made upon saving the appointment If appointment is already present, generates a user message
